backend/main.mo: Backend canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles, video uploads, watermark updates, and blob storage using mixins and a secret‑based gate.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no‑op migration that maps old actor state to the new structure without modification.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend components, hooks, styles, and extension files.
frontend/.env.example: Example env file explaining frontend access‑secret configuration and how URL hash secrets are validated.
frontend/extension/background.js: Chrome extension service worker that opens the deployed app URL containing the access secret.
frontend/extension/manifest.json: Manifest V3 definition for the Chrome extension with metadata, icons, and background worker.
frontend/extension/README.md: Guide for configuring, testing, packaging, and publishing the Chrome extension that opens the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and CSS variable theme definitions for light and dark modes with warm color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the root React app and mounting main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app managing workflow steps for uploading, marking, processing, and downloading videos, including access checks and state transitions.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main page layout with a footer and wraps child content in a full-screen container.
frontend/src/components/DownloadPanel.ts: Displays the processed video preview and offers actions to download the video or start a new workflow.
frontend/src/components/LockedScreen.tsx: Shows an access-restricted message when a user lacks a valid access link.
frontend/src/components/MyUploadsSection: Lists the user's uploaded videos with status badges and options to continue or delete each upload.
frontend/src/components/ProcessingScreen: Handles watermark marking, simulates processing progress, and displays status updates until completion or failure.
Generates and allows copying a shareable access URL derived from the user's access secret.
frontend/src/components/UploadProgressCa: Manages chunked video uploads, showing progress, handling retries or cancellation, and signaling completion.
React component for selecting and previewing a video file, handling validation and triggering upload. Integrates actor readiness state to enable or disable upload.
frontend/src/components/VideoWatermarkSe: Allows users to define and adjust a draggable/resizable watermark region over a video. Computes scale, handles mouse interactions, and initializes a default region on metadata load.
frontend/src/components/WatermarkToolsPa: Provides numeric controls for editing the watermark region and actions for navigating, resetting, and confirming processing. Updates region fields and triggers callbacks.
frontend/src/components/WorkflowHeader.t: Renders a multi-step workflow header with icons, progress indicators, and an informational alert. Displays the app logo and step highlighting based on the current stage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, with automatic refresh on identity changes. Initializes access control and invalidates dependent queries when updated.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoUpload: Provides simulated chunked upload logic with progress tracking, cancellation, retry, and error handling. Uses backend mutation to create video metadata before chunk simulation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook, managing auth client creation, login state, and stored identities. Exposes identity, login, logout, and status helpers to consumers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, mutating, and updating video data with unlisted-access checks and backend actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useUnlistedAccess.ts: Manages unlisted secret access via sessionStorage or URL hash and exposes lock state and helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoStatus.ts: Combines video data with watermark and status mutation hooks to provide status text, actions, and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom OKLCH color variables, theme tokens, and utilities for video selection UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-based state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining features, requirements, and state for an unlisted-access video app and Chrome extension.
